title: Topic 005 Question 041
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains the resources shown in the following table.
You create a service endpoint policy that has the following settings:
options: storage1 in the East US Azure region and its replica in the paired region
storage1 in the East US Azure region only
storage1 and storage2 in the East US Azure region only
storage1 and storage2 in the East US Azure region and their replicas in the paired region
